entry.def: A homosexual relationship is a sexual relationship between people of the same sex.
Someone who is homosexual is sexually attracted to people of the same sex.

example.ex: A fraud trial involving two homosexual lawyers was abandoned.
example.tran: 一桩涉及两名同性恋律师的欺诈案审判被撤销了。

means.word_mean: 1. a sexual attraction to (or sexual relations with) persons of the same sex
